Name: Shera and the Three Treasures
About the game: When the Demon Lord was defeated years ago, the world was thought to be at peace. However, a new Demon Lord has risen to power, and now ruin looms on the horizon once again... but not all is lost. In the remote village of Dexas lives a particular family of an ancient bloodline. This bloodline is capable of defeating the Demon Lord... but its strongest warrior was cursed by the enemy. Now, it falls to his sister, Shera, to gather the three Sacred Treasures and use them to defeat the Demon Lord, once and for all! Features: Classic RPG experience Explore a fantasy world Turn-based combat Animated battle sprite
